segment: Privacy Policy    IFSA-Butler is committed to respecting your privacy and protecting the information we receive from you. This policy is intended to outline the information we collect from users who visit and submit applications to our website and how we use and disclose that information.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides a general introduction to the privacy policy, stating the company's commitment to privacy and outlining the intention to describe data collection and usage practices.

segment: Information We Collect   IFSA-Butler collects two types of information from visitors to this website:  non-personally identifiable information that is automatically collected anytime you visit an IFSA-Butler webpage, such as IP address, browser type, and referring websites and   information that is voluntarily supplied by visitors through the submission of inquiry forms or applications for programs offered through IFSA-Butler.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of non-personally identifiable information automatically and information voluntarily supplied by visitors on the website.

segment: How We Use Visitor Information    IFSA-Butler collects non-personally identifiable information with the purpose of optimizing the performance of our website.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of non-personally identifiable information by IFSA-Butler for the purpose of optimizing website performance, indicating implicit collection on the website for service operation and security.

segment: We do not rent or sell personally identifiable information to third-parties for their marketing purposes. We may share your information with select third parties in the following circumstances:   We share certain information with overseas institutions and service providers, including universities and host families, so that they may provide our students with the services we request of them.   We may share certain information about you, including but not limited to your name and home institution, for the purposes of promoting IFSA-Butler programs.   We reserve the right to disclose your information to law enforcement and government officials in accordance with applicable laws, court orders and government regulations.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes sharing personally identifiable information with third parties for service provision, promotion, and legal compliance, indicating identifiable information is shared with unnamed third parties for specific purposes.

segment: We use reasonable precautions to protect your information and voluntarily abide by the guidelines outlined in the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act to maintain your privacy. By using our website, you agree to the transfer of information to countries outside the United States that have institution and service providers associated with our overseas programs.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment mentions the use of reasonable precautions to protect information, which falls under generic security measures.

segment: Use of Cookies    IFSA-Butler uses Cookies for the purpose of maintaining your session when you provide information to IFSA-Butler through web forms and our application system. Cookies are small pieces of information transferred from our website to your web browser to streamline your experience on our website and allow web servers to recognize the computer used to access the website. Our website does not use cookies to collect personally identifiable information. You can modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you wish to opt out of this service.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of cookies to maintain user sessions and improve website experience, indicating collection on the website. It specifies that cookies do not collect personally identifiable information, implying aggregated or anonymized data. Users can opt out through browser settings, hence the choice scope is collection with browser/device privacy controls.

segment: We also work with third parties, such as Facebook and Twitter, to collect certain user data through our website for the purposes of conversion tracking and serving ads targeted to users' interests. The information we share with these services does not include any specific information relating to your application to an IFSA-Butler program or your personal information. Should you wish to opt out of such tracking, please modify your browser settings or modify your privacy settings within Facebook and Twitter to disable interest-based advertising and tracking.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of user data by third parties (Facebook and Twitter) on the first-party website for advertising purposes. It specifies that no personal information is shared and users can opt out through browser or third-party settings, indicating a focus on aggregated data and user choice.

segment: Links to Other Websites   The IFSA-Butler website contains links to other websites that may or may not be affiliated with the Institute for Study Abroad, Butler University. IFSA-Butler is not responsible for the content or privacy practices on these websites, nor does the posting of a link constitute an endorsement by IFSA-Butler of said website.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides general information about links to other websites and disclaims responsibility for their content or privacy practices, which fits the Introductory/Generic sub-category.

segment: Changing Your Information or Opting Out of IFSA-Butler Communications   The personal information collected about you through our online applications and in our communications with you is stored in our internal database and can be updated or modified at any time by calling (800) 858-0229 or emailing studyabroad@ifsa-butler.org.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how users can update or modify their personal information stored in the company's internal database by contacting them via phone or email.

segment: If you wish to no longer receive all communications from IFSA-Butler, you may opt out by contacting us at (800) 858-0229 or by mail at:   1100 W. 42nd Street, Suite 305  Indianapolis, IN 46208-3345

model_analysis.explanation: The segment explains that users can opt out of communications by contacting the company, indicating a user choice mechanism for opting out.

segment: Children's Privacy   The IFSA-Butler website is not intended for visitors under the age of 13 and IFSA-Butler does not solicit or intentionally collect information from children under the age of 13.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment specifies that the website is not intended for children under the age of 13 and that the company does not intentionally collect information from them, indicating a focus on children's privacy.

segment: Changes to this Policy   We reserve the right to modify the contents of this privacy policy as needed. All changes to this policy will be posted on the IFSA-Butler website. We encourage you to periodically review this policy to remain up to date on our privacy practices.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates that changes to the privacy policy will be posted on the website, which is a general notice. There is no specific user choice or detailed change type mentioned.

segment: All textual, graphic and other content appearing on this website are the property of the Institute for Study Abroad, Butler University (IFSA-Butler). Copyright 2004-2010. Institute for Study Abroad, 1100 W. 42nd St., Suite 305, Indianapolis, Indiana 46208 USA. All Rights Reserved.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides general information regarding copyright and ownership of website content, which does not relate directly to privacy practices.
